item.title: AsciiDoc writing
item.description: Context, context, it’s all about context I started a little while ago to write a book. Yeah, I know, who would have thought, right? But that’s besides the point. Initially I used a writer specific app for Mac called Ulysses and while the app is really great, it has two disadvantages: * it is available only for Mac (and maybe in the future for iOS) * not geeky enough (I know this is a stretch for a second reason, but hey!
